name: Zingaya Click-to-Call
author: Zingaya, Inc.

sections.description: Zingaya enables voice calls through any computer, right from a webpage. No download or phone is required. Zingaya offers this seamless voice calling capability to website operators – whether it’s a huge e-commerce enterprise or a startup company. Simply embed a “Call” button into your website. Visitors can click that button and the call is immediately forwarded to your landline or mobile phone. All you need is a website; all your visitors need is a browser and microphone. It’s that easy.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for Zingaya
  3. Activate Zingaya from your Plugins page. (You will be greeted with a Welcome page.)
  4. Specify your Zingaya username/password or create new Zingaya account on a Welcome page.
  5. Open Widgets section and click Widget is active checkbox to enable widget on your website.
  6. You can customize look&feel and position of the widget by using Widget builder link (under widget name).

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Zingaya.
  2. Upload the zingaya directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate Zingaya from your Plugins page. (You will be greeted with a Welcome page.)
  4. Specify your Zingaya username/password or create new Zingaya account on a Welcome page.
  5. Open Widgets section and click Widget is active checkbox to enable widget on your website.
  6. You can customize look&feel and position of the widget by using Widget builder link (under widget name).
sections.faq:
What embedding options are available?

You can choose from 2 options – widget and button. Zingaya click-to-call button can be embedded anywhere using shortcode, template tag or WP widget. Zingaya click-to-call widget can be located on the left or right part of the page (in the middle) – it will have fixed position (and follow website visitor while scrolling).

short_description: Let your website visitors call you. Without a phone. Zingaya enables voice calls through any computer, right from a webpage.
